body_html: If you still have strong requirements on the CUDA and cuDNN versions, you should make your gpu image use the full version name like cuda:7.0-cudnn2-runtime. The tag cuda:cudnn-runtime is currently cuDNN v2 but will be bumped to cuDNN v4 once it's available (soon!).
body_text: If you still have strong requirements on the CUDA and cuDNN versions, you should make your gpu image use the full version name like cuda:7.0-cudnn2-runtime. The tag cuda:cudnn-runtime is currently cuDNN v2 but will be bumped to cuDNN v4 once it's available (soon!).
body: If you still have strong requirements on the CUDA and cuDNN versions, you should make your gpu image use the full version name like `cuda:7.0-cudnn2-runtime`. The tag `cuda:cudnn-runtime` is currently cuDNN v2 but will be bumped to cuDNN v4 once it's available (soon!).
